name: MyLUCI
0:
”Alexa, Ask my lucy about my team”
”Alexa, ask my lucy about my battery level”
”Alexa, ask my lucy what kind of questions I can ask”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my lucy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use voice commands to get various info about LUCI chair, its state, and your team like account information, battery level, location, or model number.
If you want to get some statistics, just ask about it, e.g. "Collisions avoided yesterday", "How many times she helped me last month?", etc.
If you experience any problems, ask for troubleshooting, e.g "Why I can't move", "Why the light is red", "Why my chair beeps", etc.
Ask "What to do?" to get additional information about possible questions.
